Doa Aly (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe.
A mụrụ ya na 1976, na Cairo, Egypt. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Fine Arts na Mahadum Helwan na Cairo, wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts ya na nka na ihe osise n'afọ 2001.
Ọrụ Aly gụnyere ihe osise, ihe osise. Ọrụ ya sitere na mkpali nke "mmasị na nke ọdịdị mmadụ, akwụkwọ ochie, na ịgba egwú oge ochie".
Ọrụ ya apụtala na gallery na Middle East, Africa, na Europe

Ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke ihe osise ya bụ Pixel Series na Mashrabia Gallery na Cairo, otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi mbụ nwere onwe ya na Cairo. E mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Europe na Paris, France, na 2007 na Gallery Kamel Mennour Ọrụ ya apụtala dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi na ememme na Dakar Biennale na Senegal, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie Tate Modern na London, na Turkey's Istanbul Biennial. Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na oghere nka nke oge a nke Makan, na Amman, Jọdan.
E gosipụtara Aly na ihe nkiri ụmụ akwụkwọ Some Movements for Web Camera, nke enyere onyinye site n'aka National Film School of Denmark.
